type.description: Either 'library' for static and shared libraries or 'project' for executable projects. The default value is 'library'.

include.description: Path to the directory containing header files (.h and .hpp). The default is 'include'.

source.description: Path to the directory containing source files (.c and .cpp). The default is 'src'.

compiler.description: List of supported compilers. By default one of the locally supported compilers is used.

additionalProperties.description: The compiler name (key) and version constraint (value).

arch.description: List of supported architectures. The defaults are 'x86' and 'x64'.
